meanings.sent1: She decided to overpaint the old chair to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: The artist had to overpaint the mistake on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: John accidentally overpainted his own hand while trying to fix the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter overpainted the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The rain overpainted the sidewalk with shimmering reflections.

meanings.definition: Paint applied over an existing layer.
meanings.sent1: The overpaint on the wall was starting to peel off.
meanings.sent2: He used a brush to carefully apply the overpaint on the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The overpaint spilled on the floor, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: The overpaint acted like a protective shield for the underlying layer.
meanings.sent5: The overpaint added depth and richness to the artwork.
